title: file.stats Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing resource statistics about local Notefiles.

changes.description: The number of Notes across all Notefiles pending sync.

sync.description: `true` if a sync is recommended based on the number of pending notes.

total.description: The total number of Notes across all Notefiles.

samples.title: File Statistics Response
samples.description: Response with resource statistics showing pending sync recommendation.

samples.title: No Pending Changes
samples.description: Response when no changes are pending sync.
